name: Street Basketball Sniper
description:
Street Basketball Sniper is a simple yet addictive basketball shooting game with realistic physics and great graphics. Easy to play, the target is the same - shoot basketballs into the basket to get scores. It is a funny time passing game that is suitable for everyone.
Street Basketball Sniper is a basketball shoot game where you can spend a lot of hours!
How to Play Street Basketball Sniper :
- Press the basketball
- Drag on the screen to adjust the shooting trajectory
- Release finger to shoot basketball towards the basket

Features Street Basketball Sniper :
- Easy to play, funny, time killing
- Eight balls to unlock and shoot in the game
- Global online leaderboards to compete with players from all around the world

The game is completely free. All you have to do is enjoy the game!
Become a real sniper and get on the top of leaderboards! You can do it!
